title: Podcast Exclusive: Seth Interviews Tim Robinson & Sam Richardson
description:
Podcast bonus episode! Sam Richardson and Tim Robinson, who co-created and star in the Comedy Central show "Detroiters," sat down with Seth at Late Night's 30 Rock offices to record an extended chat about starting out in the improv world in Detroit and Chicago, Seth and Tim's time at "SNL" and more.
